sourcesContent:
const Theme = {
    fonts: {
        bigtitle: "'Big Shoulders Stencil Display', cursive",
        curvy: "'Big Shoulders Inline Display', cursive",
        title: "'Montserrat', sans-serif",
        paragraph: "'Open Sans', sans-serif",
        subheader: "'Roboto', sans-serif",
        fancy: "'Raleway', sans-serif",
        timesnew: "'Playfair Display', serif"
    },
    colors: {
        platinum: "rgba(230, 230, 230, 1)",
        lightplatinum: "rgba(237, 237, 237, 1)",
        onxy: "rgba(57, 57, 58, 1)",
        darkonxy: "rgba(37, 37, 38, 1)",
        tar: "rgb(63, 63, 63)",
        opaq: "rgba(255, 255, 255, .0)",
        shadow: "0 0 20px rgba(20,20,20,.1)",
        shadowlight: "0 0 2px rgba(20,20,20,.2)",
        white: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)",
        royalblue: "rgba(37, 67, 158, 1)",
        charcoal: "rgba(40, 56, 69, 1)",
        gunmetal: "rgba(32, 44, 57, 1)",
        lightgold: "rgba(184, 176, 141, 1)",
        etonblue: "#7FC6A4",
        success: "#D6F8D6",
        failure: "#EB5160",
    },
    shadows: {
        neo: "1px 1px 4px #000000, -1px -1px 4px #ffffff",
        inset: "inset 1px 1px 5px #000000, inset -1px -1px 5px #ffffff",
        mat: "0 0 2px rgba(20,20,20,.3)",
        light: "0 0 20px rgba(20,20,20,.1)",
        border: "1px solid rgba(20,20,20,.4)"
    }
}

export default Theme
